Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts certain not-for-profit corporations from the real estate transfer tax if such conveyance is for the purpose of providing food for free to persons experiencing food insecurity
Summary: Exempts certain not-for-profit corporations from the real estate transfer tax if such conveyance is to a food relief organization for the purpose of providing food for free to persons experiencing food insecurity.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain not-for-profit corporations from the real estate transfer tax if such conveyance is for the purpose of providing food for free to persons experiencing food insecurity
